channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi ABB Power Grids -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi ABB Power Grids -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-27414|2024-08-03T20:48:16.843Z -- hitachi%20abb%20power%20grids -- ellipse%20enterprise%20asset%20management%20%28eam%29
item.description: An attacker could trick a user of Hitachi ABB Power Grids Ellipse Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) versions prior to and including 9.0.25 into visiting a malicious website posing as a login page for the Ellipse application and gather authentication credentials.

item.title: CVE-2021-27416|2024-08-03T20:48:16.986Z -- hitachi%20abb%20power%20grids -- ellipse%20enterprise%20asset%20management%20%28eam%29
item.description: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability in Hitachi ABB Power Grids Ellipse Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) versions prior to and including 9.0.25 by tricking a user to click on a link containing malicious code that would then be run by the web browser. This can result in the compromise of confidential information, or even the takeover of the userâ€™s session.
